title: Locked out of email
body: So basically, with this whole NA Finals Icon Contest, I wanted to make sure that if I win I would get an email saying so. I then checked my account email, and it happened to be my old email. When I tried to reset my email, it sent an email to the old account. However that account has been shut down and I no longer have access to it. How would I go about changing this now, if even possible? Thanks!

replies.body:
We can assist you in changing your email if you reach out to our account specialists by submitting a ticket with [this form.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) Simply fill out the request with as much info as you can remember about the account and specify that you'd like to change the email associated with your account.

We've been pretty slammed with tickets, so it may take a bit longer than normal to get a response. If you're patient with us and refrain from "bumping" your ticket, we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Let me know if you have any questions.

You would have to contact the [Riot Games Support ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584).
Simply click on Riot Games Support to be redirected to the correct form.
Fill the form out and select "Account" and then "Management" from the Category drop down box.

Riot will ask you questions such as:

- Registration E-Mail
- Registration Date
- First purchase with RP
- First 5 purchased champions

There are more questions, these are just examples of questions they might ask.
You have to answer all questions to confirm that you're the owner of the account.

After confirming that you're the owner they would change the E-Mail which is linked to your account.
Keep in mind that this process might take 24-48 hours, depending on the amount of tickets which they have.

Kind regards
Kayle
